Title: With you in charge I am at ease
Publisher: Sichuan renmin chubanshe (四川人民出版社)
Notes: "With you in charge, I am at ease", Mao writes on a piece of paper that he hands over to Hua Guofeng. Hua uses this document - which may or may not be authentic - to prove Mao really appointed him as successor.This is a print from the second edition (May 1977).
Theme: Mao and Hua: 'With you in charge, I'm at ease'
